title: Discord Server Rules
content: Please read the rules carefully. If you have any questions, please ask a staff member. If you are caught breaking any of these rules, you will be punished accordingly. If you see someone breaking any of these rules, please report them via a ticket.

title: Respect
content: Please respect everyone in the server. This includes staff and members. Do not be rude to anyone. If you have a problem with someone, please contact a staff member.

title: Harassment
content: Harassment of any kind will not be tolerated. This includes but is not limited to: racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, etc. If you are caught harassing someone, you will be punished accordingly.

title: NSFW
content: NSFW content is prohibited. This includes but is not limited to; gore, nudity, etc. If you are caught posting NSFW content, you will be punished accordingly.

title: Spamming
content: Spamming is prohibited. This includes but is not limited to; text, images, emojis, etc. If you are caught spamming, you will be punished accordingly.

title: Advertising
content: Advertising is prohibited. This includes but is not limited to; servers, social media, etc. If you are caught advertising, you will be punished accordingly.

title: Impersonation
content: Impersonation is prohibited. This includes but is not limited to; staff, members, etc. If you are caught impersonating someone, you will be punished accordingly.

title: Staff
content: Staff have the final say. If you are told to stop doing something by a staff member, please stop. If you have a problem with a staff member, please contact a higher up.
